mapper.select:
SELECT c.channel_no channelNo, c.pv pv, d.nv nv, c.uv uv FROM ( SELECT a.channel_no, SUM(a.pv) pv, COUNT(DISTINCT a.mac) uv FROM statistics.channel_visit_summary_district a WHERE 1=1 AND a.begin_time >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND a.end_time <= FROM_UNIXTIME(${startTime+span},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') GROUP BY a.channel_no ) c, ( SELECT COUNT(mac) nv, channel_no FROM statistics.channel_visit_summary_district a WHERE a.mac NOT IN ( SELECT b.mac FROM statistics.new_visitor b ) AND a.begin_time >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND a.end_time <= FROM_UNIXTIME(${startTime+span},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') GROUP BY a.channel_no ) d WHERE c.channel_no = d.channel_no
AND c.channel_no = #{channelNo}

SELECT log.channel, log.mac, MAX(log.timestamp) TIMESTAMP, log.session, m.district_id districtId, m.block_id blockId, m.residence_id residenceId FROM `api_logs_shfctv_01` log LEFT JOIN mac_info m ON log.mac = m.mac WHERE log.timestamp <= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND log.timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') GROUP BY log.mac,log.`session` ORDER BY log.`timestamp` desc
/* SELECT log.channel, log.mac, MAX(log.timestamp) TIMESTAMP, log.session, m.district_id, m.block_id, m.residence_id FROM `api_logs_shfctv_01` log LEFT JOIN mac_info m ON log.mac = m.mac WHERE `timestamp` >= '2017-03-14 00:00:00' AND `timestamp` <= '2017-03-14 01:00:00' GROUP BY mac,`session` ORDER BY `timestamp` desc;*/

SELECT log_id logId,channel,mac,`timestamp` timeStamp,session FROM api_logs_shfctv_01 WHERE session = #{log.session} AND timestamp < #{log.timeStamp} AND timestamp > DATE_ADD(#{log.timeStamp}, INTERVAL -2 HOUR)

SELECT log_id logId,channel,mac,`timestamp` timeStamp,session FROM api_logs_shfctv_01 WHERE timestamp > #{log.timestamp} AND mac = #{log.mac} and channel = #{log.channle} AND session = #{log.session} ORDER BY `timestamp` DESC
SELECT block_id from mac_info WHERE mac = #{log.mac}
select residence_id from mac_info WHERE mac = #{log.mac}

SELECT log_id logId, channel, mac, min(`timestamp`) TIMESTAMP, SESSION FROM api_logs_shfctv_01 WHERE TIMESTAMP < #{log.timeStamp} AND `timestamp` > FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND mac = #{log.mac} AND channel = #{log.channel} AND session = #{log.session}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO statistics.realtime_trend_60m_block (id,channel_no,begin_time,end_time,uv,pv,nv,avg_top,block_id) SELECT NULL,a.channel,'${startTime}','${endTime}',count(DISTINCT(a.mac)),count(a.log_id),count(c.id),NULL,b.block_id FROM statistics.api_logs_shfctv a INNER JOIN statistics.mac_info b ON a.mac = b.mac LEFT JOIN statistics.new_visitor c ON b.mac = c.mac WHERE a.timestamp >= #{startTime} and a.timestamp <= #{endTime} GROUP BY b.block_id,a.channel

INSERT INTO statistics.realtime_trend_60m_district (id,channel_no,begin_time,end_time,uv,pv,nv,avg_top,district_id) SELECT NULL,a.channel,'${startTime}','${endTime}',count(DISTINCT(a.mac)),count(a.log_id),count(c.id),NULL,b.district_id FROM statistics.api_logs_shfctv a INNER JOIN statistics.mac_info b ON a.mac = b.mac LEFT JOIN statistics.new_visitor c ON b.mac = c.mac WHERE a.timestamp >= #{startTime} and a.timestamp <= #{endTime} GROUP BY b.district_id,a.channel

INSERT INTO statistics.realtime_trend_60m_residence (id,channel_no,begin_time,end_time,uv,pv,nv,avg_top,residence_id) SELECT NULL,a.channel,'${startTime}','${endTime}',count(DISTINCT(a.mac)),count(a.log_id),count(c.id),NULL,b.residence_id FROM statistics.api_logs_shfctv a INNER JOIN statistics.mac_info b ON a.mac = b.mac LEFT JOIN statistics.new_visitor c ON b.mac = c.mac WHERE a.timestamp >= #{startTime} and a.timestamp <= #{endTime} GROUP BY b.residence_id,a.channel

INSERT INTO statistics.realtime_trend_24h_block (id,channel_no,begin_time,end_time,uv,pv,nv,avg_top,block_id) SELECT NULL,a.channel,'${startTime}','${endTime}',count(DISTINCT(a.mac)),count(a.log_id),count(c.id),NULL,b.block_id FROM statistics.api_logs_shfctv a INNER JOIN statistics.mac_info b ON a.mac = b.mac LEFT JOIN statistics.new_visitor c ON b.mac = c.mac WHERE a.timestamp >= #{startTime} and a.timestamp <= #{endTime} GROUP BY b.block_id,a.channel

INSERT INTO statistics.realtime_trend_24h_district (id,channel_no,begin_time,end_time,uv,pv,nv,avg_top,district_id) SELECT NULL,a.channel,'${startTime}','${endTime}',count(DISTINCT(a.mac)),count(a.log_id),count(c.id),NULL,b.district_id FROM statistics.api_logs_shfctv a INNER JOIN statistics.mac_info b ON a.mac = b.mac LEFT JOIN statistics.new_visitor c ON b.mac = c.mac WHERE a.timestamp >= #{startTime} and a.timestamp <= #{endTime} GROUP BY b.district_id,a.channel

INSERT INTO statistics.realtime_trend_24h_residence (id,channel_no,begin_time,end_time,uv,pv,nv,avg_top,residence_id) SELECT NULL,a.channel,'${startTime}','${endTime}',count(DISTINCT(a.mac)),count(a.log_id),count(c.id),NULL,b.residence_id FROM statistics.api_logs_shfctv a INNER JOIN statistics.mac_info b ON a.mac = b.mac LEFT JOIN statistics.new_visitor c ON b.mac = c.mac WHERE a.timestamp >= #{startTime} and a.timestamp <= #{endTime} GROUP BY b.residence_id,a.channel
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM statistics.new_visitor ORDER BY first_visit_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO statistics.new_vistor (id,channel_no,mac,first_visit_time) SELECT NULL,channel,mac,timestamp FROM statistics.api_logs_shfctv WHERE timestamp <= #{startTime} GROUP BY mac

INSERT INTO statistics.new_vistor (id,channel_no,mac,first_visit_time) SELECT NULL,a.channel,a.mac,a.timestamp FROM statistics.api_logs_shfctv a LEFT JOIN statistics.new_visitor b ON a.mac = b.mac WHERE b.id is NULL AND log_id >( SELECT log_id FROM statistics.api_logs_shfctv WHERE mac = #{mac} AND timestamp = #{lastVisitTime} ) GROUP BY a.mac
